itinerary.route: Flight to Lukla; Trek to Phakding
itinerary.mapNote: Fly Lukla, trek down Dudh Koshi. 2610m.

itinerary.keyHighlight: First view of Everest; Hillary Bridge
itinerary.mapNote: Steep climb via Hillary Bridge. Sherpa capital. 3440m.
Diverge from EBC trail west. Thame monastery. 3800m.

itinerary.keyHighlight: Ancient salt trade route to Tibet
itinerary.mapNote: Remote valley camp before Renjo La. 4380m.

itinerary.route: Lungden to Gokyo via Renjo La

itinerary.mapNote: Pre-dawn Gokyo Ri 5357m summit. Rest day. 4790m.

itinerary.route: Dragnag to Dzongla via Cho La
Lobuche to Gorak Shep (EBC Side Trip)
itinerary.mapNote: EBC 5364m side trip. Gorak Shep sleep. 5140m.
Pre-dawn Kala Patthar 5545m summit. Return Lobuche. 4940m.

itinerary.route: Lobuche to Chhukung via Kongma La
itinerary.mapNote: After Kongma La 5535m — highest of three passes. 4730m.
Optional Chhukung Ri 5550m. Descend to Pangboche monastery. 3985m.
Long return day down Imja and Dudh Koshi valleys. 3440m.
Final descent to Lukla. Last teahouse night. 2840m.

waypoints.name: Renjo La Pass
waypoints.note: First of three passes. Everest, Makalu & Cho Oyu panorama.

waypoints.name: Gokyo Ri Summit
waypoints.note: Best 360° view of Everest massif — many prefer to EBC.

waypoints.name: Gokyo Lake (4th Lake)
waypoints.note: Sacred Dudh Pokhari. Turquoise glacial lake chain.

waypoints.name: Ngozumpa Glacier
waypoints.note: Longest glacier in Nepal. 36km. Moraine traverse.

waypoints.name: Cho La Pass
waypoints.note: Second pass. Glacier crossing. Crampons may be needed.

waypoints.name: Everest Base Camp
waypoints.note: Khumbu Icefall and Base Camp. Day trip from Gorak Shep.

waypoints.name: Kala Patthar
waypoints.note: Highest point on standard EBC itineraries. Everest dawn view.

waypoints.name: Kongma La Pass
waypoints.note: Third and highest pass of Three Passes route.

waypoints.name: Chhukung Ri
waypoints.note: Optional peak with Island Peak and Lhotse views.

waypoints.name: Tengboche Monastery
waypoints.note: Most famous monastery in Khumbu. Ama Dablam backdrop.
